chapter_grades.name: user_id
chapter_grades.description: The numeric user ID of the learner from the edX platform

chapter_grades.name: chapter_mid
chapter_grades.description: The module ID of a given chapter

chapter_grades.name: user_chapter_max_grade
chapter_grades.description: The maximum grade a learner achieved within a given chapter

chapter_grades.name: chgrade
chapter_grades.description: The grade achieved by a learner in a given chapter

chapter_grades.name: due_date_max
chapter_grades.description: The maximum due date of the items in a given chapter

chapter_grades.name: due_date_min
chapter_grades.description: The minimum due date of the items in a given chapter

chapter_grades.name: median_grade
chapter_grades.description: The median grade achieved by a learner in a given chapter

description: Table generated with SQL query file chapter_grades.sql using the simeon CLI tool. It computes the grade details of a learner by chapter.
